data.name: Images of equipment / 外型裝備 /イメージ装備 (Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-)
data.detailed_description:
Adds the following content to Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded-.

Equipments
･Doll Shield
･X-Mode, Activate!!!
･Heart Breaker
･Isolation Shield
･Kokoro Dream
･Kokoro Emotion, "Irritation"
･Kokoro Emotion, "Rage"
･Kokoro Emotion, "Delight"
･Daiyosei's Wings
･Zuura

[Attention]
Added equipments would be sold at the vending machine inside Hakurei Shrine.

fullgame.name: Touhou Genso Wanderer -Reloaded- / 不可思议的幻想乡TOD -RELOADED- / 不思議の幻想郷TOD -RELOADED-

English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3550
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bit, Windows® 8.1 64bit, Windows® 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 VRAM 3GB+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
